solution_line_template: At {days_per_week} days a week, it takes Bert {weeks_per_pencil} * {days_per_week} = <<{weeks_per_pencil}*{days_per_week}={days_per_pencil}>>{days_per_pencil} days of daily crossword puzzles to use up a pencil.
Since Bert does one puzzle a day, each crossword puzzle has {words_per_pencil} / {days_per_pencil} = <<{words_per_pencil}/{days_per_pencil}={words_per_puzzle}>>{words_per_puzzle} words.
